Service Details: - Offers federal apprenticeship grants to apprentices registered with their provincial authority in a designated Red Seal trade - Offers Apprenticeship Incentive Grant, a taxable cash grant of $1,000 per year, to a maximum of $2,000 per person - Offers Apprenticeship Completion Grant, a taxable grant to a maximum of $2,000, available to registered apprentices who have successfully completed their apprenticeship training and obtained their journeyperson certification
Eligibility: Please visit the webpage or call for details on eligibility
